meanings.definition: To have shopped at a mall.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I malled with my friends and bought new shoes.
meanings.sent2: She malled for hours, looking for the perfect birthday gift.
meanings.sent3: After malling all day, she realized she forgot her wallet at home!
meanings.sent4: The mall malled with people during the holiday season.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of malling during a sale is unmatched.

meanings.definition: To have been transformed into a mall.
meanings.sent1: The old factory was malled into a modern shopping center.
meanings.sent2: The empty lot was malled into a bustling mall within months.
meanings.sent3: The town was surprised when the park suddenly malled overnight.
meanings.sent4: The once quiet neighborhood was malled into a vibrant shopping district.
meanings.sent5: The forest was malled into a concrete jungle of shops and restaurants.
